Value Funds Smashed Growth In Q3, Thanks To This Surprise Position $AAPL $GOOG $FB $GOOGL https://goo.gl/1eHDXn

links.title: Value Funds Smashed Growth In Q3, Thanks To This Surprise Position
links.description: Value investors have been waiting patiently for their time in the sun, and it finally arrived in the third quarter. Data from Bank of America Merrill Lynch indicates that value funds significantly outperformed growth funds. Value funds have two tech bigwigs to thank for their outperformance, and maybe not in the way you're thinking right now.

links.title: 8 Tech Stocks to Buy for the Future of Healthcare -- Besides Amazon
links.description: Amazon (NASDAQ:) has made repeated headlines about its impending expansion into the healthcare. From teaming up with JPMorgan (NYSE:) and Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:, NYSE:) to form a still-vague healthcare alliance, to buying Pill Pack, Wall Street is ready for the e-commerce giant to "disrupt" the healthcare sector next.
